greeting: Hi {{patient_name}}, looking forward to meeting you! üëã
context: I know the first visit to a fertility clinic can be nerve-wracking.
explanation: Tomorrow is just a 'fact-finding' mission. No big decisions need to be made instantly. We will just review your history, do a basic scan, and explain the science.
next_steps: Bring: Previous reports (HSG, semen analysis), ID proof, and a list of questions written down so you don't forget them.
reassurance: You are taking the first brave step towards your family. We are here to hold your hand, not to judge.
call_to_action: Please confirm your arrival time. Valet parking is available.

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, this is the intake nurse.
context: [WARM TONE] I'm calling to confirm your appointment and check how you're feeling about coming in.
explanation: It is completely normal to feel anxious or scared that you'll get 'bad news'. But remember, information is power. Knowing what's wrong is the only way to fix it.
next_steps: Dr. {{doctor_name}} is very gentle. We will start with a chat, not an exam.
reassurance: Most patients leave the first consult feeling relieved because they finally have a plan.
call_to_action: Do you have any specific fears I can note down for the doctor beforehand?

context: Kal aapka pehla appointment hai humare saath.
explanation: Pehli baar fertility clinic aana thoda stressful ho sakta hai. Tension mat lijiye. Hum bas baat karenge aur samjhenge ki dikkat kahan hai.
next_steps: Apne husband {{partner_name}} ke saath aana best rahega. Purani files saath layein.
reassurance: Aap akele nahi hain. Har roz naye couples aate hain aur khushi khushi parents ban kar jaate hain. Bas pehla step mushkil lagta hai. üíö
call_to_action: See you tomorrow at {{appt_time}}!

context: I know the cost of IVF (approx ‚Çπ1.5-2L) is a major concern.
explanation: We want you to focus on the baby, not the bill. We have partnered with medical loan providers (Liquiloans/Bajaj) to offer 0% Interest EMI options.
next_steps: You can split the cost into 9 or 12 monthly installments. Approval takes 2 hours with just PAN/Aadhar card.
reassurance: We can also look at 'Minimal Stimulation' protocols which use fewer injections to save cost, if you are a good candidate.
call_to_action: Should I ask the finance manager to call you with the EMI breakdown?

context: Treatment costs ko lekar agar aap pareshan hain, toh please baat karein.
explanation: Paisa ki chinta hona natural hai. Humare paas flexible payment plans hain. Aap ek saath pay karne ki jagah 'Step-by-Step' pay kar sakte hain (pehle stimulation, fir lab, fir transfer).
next_steps: Humare counselor se mil lijiye. Wo aapko best package guide karenge.
reassurance: Money should not be the barrier to your parenthood. Hum kuch na kuch rasta nikal lenge.
call_to_action: Reply 'FINANCE' agar aap call chahte hain.

context: [GENTLE] I noticed some tension during the consultation today, which is very common.
explanation: Infertility is one of the hardest things a marriage can go through. It changes intimacy into a 'schedule' and adds blame or guilt. It is not anyone's fault‚Äîit is a medical condition.
next_steps: I strongly suggest a 'date night' with NO baby talk. Reconnect as a couple, not just as 'potential parents'.
reassurance: Couples who survive IVF often have the strongest marriages because they have fought a war together. Be kind to each other.
call_to_action: We have a relationship counselor available on Saturdays if you want to talk.

context: Checking in on you and {{partner_name}}.
explanation: The hormone injections can make you irritable, and the pressure on him for samples is stressful. If you guys are fighting more than usual, it's the IVF speaking, not the lack of love.
next_steps: Try to designate 20 mins a day to talk about IVF, then ban the topic for the rest of the evening.
reassurance: This phase is temporary. Your relationship is the permanent foundation for the child you are trying to bring.
call_to_action: Here is a link to a support group for couples: [Link]

context: Bas remind karna tha ki is journey mein partner ka support sabse zaroori hai.
explanation: Kabhi kabhi hum treatment mein itna kho jate hain ki marriage suffer karti hai. Ek dusre ko blame mat karna.
next_steps: Aaj shaam ko kuch non-medical discuss karna. Movie dekho ya bahar jao.
reassurance: Ye mushkil waqt aap dono ko strong banayega. You are a team! ü§ù
call_to_action: Take care of each other.

context: You mentioned the pressure from in-laws was becoming unmanageable.
explanation: In our culture, everyone feels entitled to ask 'Good News kab sunaoge?'. You need to know that your medical history is PRIVATE. You do not owe anyone an explanation.
next_steps: Practice a standard reply: 'We are focusing on our careers/health right now. We will let you know when there is news.' Then change the subject.
reassurance: Setting boundaries doesn't make you a bad daughter-in-law. It makes you a sane patient. Stress affects success rates, so protect your peace.
call_to_action: Do you want to role-play this conversation?

context: Dealing with nosy relatives?
explanation: It's okay to skip family functions if they trigger you. Prioritize your mental health.
next_steps: Counseling available if you need venting space.
reassurance: Your journey, your timeline.
call_to_action: Call to book a session.

context: You are 5 days post-transfer. This is usually when the anxiety peaks.
explanation: You might be symptom spotting. 'Do my breasts hurt? Do I feel cramps?' Please remember, progesterone causes ALL these symptoms even if you aren't pregnant. Symptoms tell us nothing.
next_steps: Stay off Google. It is a rabbit hole of anxiety. Watch a comedy series instead.
reassurance: The embryo is safe inside. Stressing won't un-implant it, but relaxing makes the wait bearable.
call_to_action: Hang in there. Only {{days_left}} days to the beta test.

context: TWW mushkil hota hai.
explanation: Ghar pe Urine Test mat karna. Wo early stages mein negative aa sakta hai jo galat hoga.
next_steps: Beta Blood test {{beta_date}} ko hi final maana jayega.
reassurance: Positive socho! ü§û
call_to_action: Wait for the blood test.

context: It's been a week since the results.
explanation: I hope you are taking time to heal. It's okay to cry, scream, or do nothing. You are grieving a dream.
next_steps: Dr. {{doctor_name}} has reviewed your file. We have some ideas for what to change next time (different protocol/testing).
reassurance: But for now, just breathe. Your body and mind need a break. We are ready when you are.
call_to_action: We have an online support group meeting on Sunday. Join if you like.

context: Ek hafta ho gaya result ko. Kaise feel kar rahe ho?
explanation: Agar aap abhi kisi se baat nahi karna chahte, toh its okay. Grief ka koi timeline nahi hota.
next_steps: Jab aap ready feel karein, hum ek 'Cycle Review' meeting rakh sakte hain.
reassurance: Haar mat maanna. Bohot se patients first attempt mein fail hote hain par finally succeed karte hain.
call_to_action: Counselor se baat karni hai? Reply 'YES'.

greeting: Hello {{patient_name}}, congratulations on the positive scan!
context: [EMPATHY] I know you aren't celebrating yet because of your previous miscarriage.
explanation: Pregnancy after loss is a unique kind of anxiety. Every cramp feels like a threat. But this pregnancy is different. The embryo is PGT-A tested/stronger.
next_steps: We will monitor you more closely. You can come for scans every week if that helps your anxiety.
reassurance: Today, at this moment, you are pregnant and the baby is okay. Take it one day at a time.
call_to_action: Call me directly if you have any spotting. I'm here for you.

context: Reaching the 8-week mark today!
explanation: I know you've been holding your breath. Passing the milestone of your previous loss is huge.
next_steps: Continue your medications. The placenta is taking over now.
reassurance: Different egg, different sperm, different pregnancy. The odds are in your favor this time.
call_to_action: Celebrate this small win today!

context: We discussed the Donor Egg option yesterday, and I know it's a big shift mentally.
explanation: Many women worry, 'Will the baby be mine?'. Biologically, you are the one building the baby. Your blood, your oxygen, your body grows the child. Epigenetics shows that the womb environment influences how genes express.
next_steps: Take time to mourn the genetic link. It is a real loss. But the bond of motherhood comes from carrying and raising, not just DNA.
reassurance: Once the baby is in your arms, 99% of patients tell me they forget it was a donor egg. They just see their child.
call_to_action: Do you want to speak to another patient who used a donor?

context: Thoughts on the donor program.
explanation: The donor provides the cell, but YOU provide the life. You are the mother in every way that matters.
next_steps: Our donor database has profiles with detailed medical history and childhood photos to help you match characteristics.
reassurance: Success rates with donor eggs jump to 60-70% because the eggs are young (age 21-25). It is the fastest route to a baby.
call_to_action: Let us know if you want to see the profiles.

context: Donor egg ke baare mein jo baat hui thi...
explanation: Genetic link na hone ka dukh natural hai. Par yaad rakhna, bachha khoon se nahi, pyaar aur parvarish se banta hai. Aap hi usse 9 months carry karogi.
next_steps: Donor sirf 'ek cell' de rahi hai. Baaki sab aapka hai.
reassurance: Duniya ke liye wo aapka aur {{partner_name}} ka hi bachha hoga. Hum confidentiality maintain karte hain.
call_to_action: Sochiye is baare mein. Humare counselor se baat kar sakte hain.

context: Following up on our difficult conversation yesterday.
explanation: Deciding to stop IVF is not 'giving up'. It is choosing to prioritize your life, your body, and your marriage over medical procedures.
next_steps: Here are the resources I mentioned regarding adoption and child-free living communities.
reassurance: You are whole and complete, with or without a biological child. We are proud of how hard you fought.
call_to_action: Our door is always open if you change your mind, but take care of yourself now.

context: Here is the financial breakdown for your upcoming IVF cycle.
explanation:
Attached is the PDF with package details. 
**Inclusions:** Scans, Doctor Fees, OT Charges, Anesthesia. 
**Exclusions:** Stimulation Injections (approx ‚Çπ60-80k), Pharmacy, Blood tests.
next_steps: Please review. Payment is due in 2 parts: 50% on Day 2, 50% on Pickup Day.
reassurance: No hidden OT charges. We believe in transparency.
call_to_action: Let us know if you need the EMI loan paperwork.

context: Regarding Insurance Claims for IVF.
explanation: Generally, standard Mediclaim policies in India do NOT cover IVF/Infertility. They consider it 'planned' or 'cosmetic'. However, some corporate policies (GIPSA/MNCs) do have a sub-limit for fertility.
next_steps: Please check your policy wording for 'Fertility Treatment'. If covered, we need the TPA Approval Letter before admission.
reassurance: We will provide all necessary documents/letters to help you file for reimbursement if eligible.
call_to_action: Send us your policy card photo to verify.

context: Insurance Update.
explanation: Your insurer has approved ‚Çπ{{amount}} for the procedure. Balance ‚Çπ{{balance}} must be paid by you.
next_steps: Pay balance at admission desk.
reassurance: Approval received.
call_to_action: Bring TPA ID card.

context: Making IVF affordable.
explanation: We offer 0% Interest EMI for 6, 9, or 12 months via Liquiloans.
next_steps:
**Documents needed:** PAN Card, Aadhar Card, Last 3 months Bank Statement. 
**Process:** Digital sign on mobile. Approval in 2 hours.
reassurance: You don't need a credit card. It is a medical loan.
call_to_action: Come 30 mins early to process this before your appointment.

context: Explaining the cost structure.
explanation: The total package is ‚Çπ1.5L. If you pay upfront, we offer a 5% discount. Or we can do the EMI route.
next_steps: The EMI would be approx ‚Çπ12,500 per month for 12 months.
reassurance: There is no processing fee and no foreclosure charges if you want to pay it off early.
call_to_action: Which option works better for your budget?

context: Medication Order.
explanation: You need: {{medication}} {{dose}}. Order now for Day 2 start.
next_steps: Call pharmacy at Ext 102.
reassurance: Keep in fridge immediately.
call_to_action: Order today.

context: Injections order karne ke instructions.
explanation: Aapko Gonal-F / Menopur chahiye hoga. Note karein ki ye **Cold Chain** medicines hain.
next_steps: Jaise hi delivery aaye, unhe turant Fridge ke door compartment mein rakhein. Freezer mein NAHI rakhna (jum jayega toh kharab ho jayega).
reassurance: Ice pack ke saath delivery aayegi.
call_to_action: Milne par photo bhejein confirm karne ke liye.

context: Reminder for tomorrow's scan.
explanation: Follicular Study Scan at {{appt_time}}.
next_steps:
1. Drink water (Full Bladder required). 
2. Bring your Injection File/Chart.
reassurance: We will check how the eggs are growing.
call_to_action: Reply YES to confirm.

context: Lab Reports.
explanation: Your Hormone/Semen Analysis results are ready.
next_steps: Pickup from reception Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm.
reassurance: Dr will discuss in next consult.
call_to_action: Bring ID proof.

context: Checking your medication stock.
explanation: You are approaching Day 8 of stimulation. You might need a refill of {{medication}}.
next_steps: Count your vials today. If you have less than 2 days' stock, order immediately.
reassurance: Don't run out! Missing a dose affects the cycle.
call_to_action: Need a prescription? Message us.

context: Davai khatam?
explanation: Progesterone medicines khatam hone wali hain?
next_steps: Renewal ke liye call karein. Treatment beech mein rukna nahi chahiye.
reassurance: Pharmacy home delivery available hai.
call_to_action: Call Pharmacy.

context: Regarding your request for medical records/file.
explanation: You have full rights to your medical data. We need a formal request to release the file.
next_steps:
1. Fill the 'Records Release Form'. 
2. Attach ID proof. 
3. Pay administrative fee ‚Çπ500.
reassurance: We will prepare the full file (Scans, Lab reports, OT notes) within 7 days.
call_to_action: Stop by reception to sign the form.

context: Supporting your decision for a second opinion.
explanation: We understand you want to consult another expert. That is completely okay! We want you to feel confident.
next_steps: We have compiled your summary report. You can share this with the other doctor so you don't have to repeat tests.
reassurance: Your embryos remain safe with us regardless. We just want your success.
call_to_action: The file is ready for pickup.

context: I heard you are seeking a second opinion.
explanation: I fully support this. Sometimes a fresh pair of eyes helps. I will ensure all your records are transparently shared.
next_steps: If the new doctor suggests a protocol change we haven't tried, let me know. We can collaborate.
reassurance: Please don't feel awkward. This is about your baby, not my ego.
call_to_action: Let me know if you need any specific test results emailed.

context: Moving your embryos to another clinic.
explanation: We need to coordinate the 'Cryo-Shipping'.
next_steps:
1. Need 'Acceptance Letter' from new clinic. 
2. Hire a specialized courier (e.g., CryoShip). 
3. Sign 'Release of Liability' form.
reassurance: We will ensure the tank is sealed and nitrogen levels are safe before handover.
call_to_action: Coordinate the date with us 1 week in advance.

context: Since you are moving to a clinic in your hometown.
explanation: We have packed your discharge summary and CD of all scans.
next_steps: Hand this to your new doctor. It explains exactly what meds you were on.
reassurance: We wish you all the best! You are always welcome back if things change.
call_to_action: Safe travels!

context: Missed Appointment.
explanation: Aaj aapka appointment tha jo miss ho gaya.
next_steps: Treatment mein gap na aaye isliye reschedule karna zaroori hai.
reassurance: Kal ka slot available hai.
call_to_action: Reply YES to book tomorrow.
